text.text: DOS, or Disk Operating System was the dominant

text.name: info2
text.text: operating system for IBM PC compatible machines

text.name: info3
text.text: in the 1980s and early to mid 1990s.

text.name: info5
text.text: Several companies created their own variant of

text.name: info6
text.text: DOS, with Microsoft's MS-DOS being the most

text.name: info7

text.name: info8
text.text: FreeDOS is a current open source implementation

text.name: info9
